DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the effect of taking ketoconazole on sufentanil plasma concentrations following sublingual administration of sufentanil NanoTab.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Ketoconazole on Sufentanil NanoTab Pharmacokinetics
DOC.criteria: Non smoking Ages 18 to 45 year, inclusive BMI between 18 and 30 subjects taking any prescription or OTC medications or vitamins or supplements pregnant females subjects with pulmonary disease or sleep apnea
DOC.keyword: Area under curve, time to maximum concentration
